page.title: 12VILLAGE ACTIVITIES CONT.
page.content: is a large fete which includes stalls, raffles,games and refreshments. The BROWNIES meet in the parish hall on a Wednesday evening. On leaving the Brownies the children transfer to the guides at west walton.There is a cub pack for the village boys. but this meets at Terrington St John on a Wednesday evening. The boys tranfer to the scouts group at Terrington St. John. At the present time there is no village YOUTH CLUB or SUNDAY SCHOOL but plans are in hand for the reopening of both. The village does have a number of different types of DANCES organised by local groups. Some of these are held in Wings Barn and some in the Parish Hall.
